titleStmt.title: The sergeant maior A dialogue of the office of a sergeant maior. VVritten in Spanishe by the Maister of the Campe Francisco de Valdes. And translated into Englishe, by Iohn Thorius.
Espejo, y deceplina militar. English
titleStmt.author: Valdés, Francisco de, militar.
Thorie, John, b. 1568.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Espejo, y deceplina militar.
Running title reads: The office of the sergeant maior.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
